solution_line_template: James has {total_marbles} marbles / {num_bags} bags = <<{total_marbles}/{num_bags}={marbles_per_bag}>>{marbles_per_bag} marbles per bag.
James has {total_marbles} marbles - {marbles_per_bag} marbles = <<{total_marbles}-{marbles_per_bag}={marbles_remaining}>>{marbles_remaining} marbles remaining.
